title: Fall
verse: For all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God.

title: Separation
verse: The wages of sin is death, but the gift of God is eternal life...

title: Sacrifice
verse: He was pierced for our transgressions, crushed for our sins...

title: Love
verse: For God so loved the world that He gave His only Son...

title: Response
verse: If you confess with your mouth ‘Jesus is Lord’...

title: New Life
verse: If anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation...
